text_block_list.text:
Today is the day of the Selection Race, where rookie Uma 
Musume are scouted based on their performance.

I headed to the course, excited to see 
what kind of Uma Musume I would meet.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: No-no-no! Maya wants to race too! Let me in!

text_block_list.name: Selection Race Official A
text_block_list.text:
Listen here, Mayano Top Gun-san! Please stop going to the track without 
permission! Ugh, how persistent……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: No-No-No-Noo! Maya wants to feel the excitement too～!

From a distance, Mayano Top Gun and a race staff were 
arguing about something……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Heh heh heh, I won't get caught～! 
…… Woah!?

The fleeing Mayano Top Gun bumped into 
me, so I held her in a hurry.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Awawawa, sorry-! Are you okay!?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ye-yeah, Maya is fine! Because you managed to catch me……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe. You're so sweet! Are you a new 
trainer? You can call Maya, Mayano Top Gun―

text_block_list.name: Selection Race Official A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, just in time! Trainer! Can you keep an 
eye on her so she doesn't go off to the track 
without permission again? I'm counting on you!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: E-Ehhhh-!? Wait! Why are you saying 'yes'!?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Geez―, I thought you were a kind trainer～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
What's going on……? 
It's so noisy……

text_block_list.name: Selection Race Official A
text_block_list.text:
It's almost time! 
Everyone who's going to be racing, 
please get ready!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Mm…… I should go.

Despite the earlier argument, it seems that she 
did not make it to the race. The Selection Race started 
without Mayano Top Gun……

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
―And, they're off! All Uma Umusume 
are running! We have Narita Brian grabbing everyone's attention, 
what kind of race will she show us today!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …… I'm gonna shred you all.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Amazing positioning! Narita Brian 
is now in the leading pack!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Aww, how nice… Maya wanted to race too～ 
Maya's bored.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hey-hey, at least chat with Maya! Do you have anything 
interesting to talk about?

Mayano Top Gun, depressed after getting scolded, 
gazed at the course while muttering about something.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……Oh. That scary looking lady is going to 
make a move―

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Time to end this……!

Just like Maya said, there was a big 
change in momentum happening in the racecourse.

Her prediction of Narita Brian's move was accurate 
as if she read her mind……

Is it coincidence? 
Or……

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian, she's running fast! 
She's weaving her way 
through the pack and pushing forward!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Woah, Amazing!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……Hmm? Oh? That girl 
in second position―

Hearing Maya's words, my eyes were 
directed to the second place Uma Musume.

……If the timing is right, she might be able to block 
Narita Brian in that position.

And - if all goes well - she could enter the 
final straight with everyone behind her.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Mmm… when the timing feels right, I'd slip 
in with a buzz and then, babyuune!! I'd be able to block her like that.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: A good timing～…… Ah, now!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Move……!!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume In Second Place
text_block_list.text: Ahhhh…… I can't～……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Aww, how un～fortunate.

……That Uma Musume seems to have failed, 
but Maya's timing was perfect.

If it had been Mayano Top Gun, 
then maybe―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ughh, must feel nice to run! 
Maya also wanted to race～.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Huh? 
What's wrong? Staring at Maya like that…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Could it be…… 'Love At First Sight'? 
Kyaa☆, Maya is just irresistible!
―The race ended with Narita Brian taking first place…

All the trainers were desperate to 
scout Narita Brian.
But……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……Oh. That scary looking lady is going to 
make a move―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Mmm… when the timing feels right, I'd slip 
in with a buzz and then, babyuune!! I'd be able to block her like that.

Mayano Top Gun was able to completely analyze the race development, 
although she was clumsy in verbalizing her thoughts.

I couldn't help but notice the glimpse 
of brilliance she showed……
